intro: Rudolfangraecum dollii, commonly known as the Dollii's rockrose, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae, which includes many milkweed species. Rudolfangraecum dollii thrives in rocky, well-drained soils and is often found in dry, arid environments. It is valued in horticulture for its ornamental appeal and drought tolerance.
